message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $200?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're willing to make a serious offer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $180. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about $150?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $160. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I'm really close to walking away, but I'll make one more offer. How about $140?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $155. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll love the product at this price.
